Articles.Content:
I'd love to see a new part that provides me with a joint of some sort that I can rotate with Action Groups.

For example, I'd like to build a rover, that has one set of downward-facing radial engines for landing, but can also rotate those engines to the back to give it extra thrust up a hill, and can also rotate those engines upwards to turn the rover over when I inevitably flip it after rocketing up a hill.

Robotics is in what not to suggest. You can use Infernal Robotics, it adds that and more.

Edited September 12, 2013 by Dart980
As Dart980 says, Infernal Robotics is everything you're asking for.
Suggested lot of time already and so on the what not to suggest stickies. Thread close.
